Pre-Game Insights: The Magic have won each of their last 28 games at Kia Center against teams that held a losing record.
The Jazz have lost each of their last eight road games against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
The Magic have covered the spread in nine of their last 10 games at Kia Center following a win.
The Jazz have failed to cover the spread in five of their last six games as underdogs against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
Others: The Magic rank 1st in the league for opponent offensive rebounds per game this season (8.4).
The Magic rank 30th in the league for three-point percentage this season (31.0%).
The Jazz rank 30th in the league for opponent blocks per game this season (6.4).
The Jazz rank 30th in the league for turnovers per game this season (18.3).
